content.detailedDescription: Finally come to grips with this one....But when i was about 8 yrs....My family was taken and examined.....However, i beleive that i was able to use my spatial awareness/astral projection even at that age....So when i was unable to be kept asleep, i jumped up to escape.   i had to be paralyzed in mid stride.   i distincly flash back to see the looks on the faces of the aliens.  especially the elder, raised eybrow they seemed intrigued...They had to show me what they were doing as i remained in this state....Examining each of us.   they showed me a very large screen where children were taken to a remote desert planet and led to beleive they were actually on a carnival ride similar to ours.....Circular rotation with rise and fall with an increase  and decrease in speed, and minor g force fluctuation.   they thought they were on a carnival ride, yet they were actually being studied for their space/time/gravitational awareness!!  ingenious....Why??  because as we evolve we will be able to focus more on our sense of gravity and spatial awareness.  our sense of sound touch smell and thought will be finely tuned to be able to alter the physical, as they do.....That is why they communicate with telepathy..It is easy for them, and there are a lot of humans as well. they have told me they have evolved much differntly....A more light oriented and denser atmosphere where there ocean is more jelly like and plasmic, so as to create a bipedal amoebic....Hence they have an exoskeleton..Their evolution was much more rapid in this plasmic state....And yes it does consist of some silicon...But not sure of it all...They like to communicate with those they have visited previously through intergalactic talepathy, as in viewing remotely....The one that coms with me most even told me that  our theory of everything as in "string theory" is not extrapolated enuff, that in the multi dimensional we must be able to have the physics/chemistry/gemetry/stats/  all interconnected, and that our understanding of the "depth" of all consumates the interconnection of all theorem.  thus, e=mc squared is missing volume and geometry and also a chemical and statistacal probability of the mass as the entity relates to the energy and constant.  also that kinetic energy involves a molecular exchange of particles between two objects whether static or not.  ie a human hand may walk by a radio and its signal interupts via the exchange of human boundary (kinetic) and radio /soundwave (kinetic) that the understanding of the mass/size/molecules of this energy and its fields surrounds everything!.  and that our superconductors are way way to big!
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription: Me and 5 friends were star gazing in the back yard of our old elementary school trying to find constelations. when i saw what appeared to be a huge triangle in the sky. i pointed it out to every one and we were all amazed. then i saw a faint light in the center so i pointed that out to them to and not a second after i said "hey look at the little light in the middle" the very faint light all of a sudden got real real bright and moved across a large portion of the sky from north to south in seconds and then came from an amazing speed to a dead stop. i look at my friends and we found each other speachless then looked back and watched it dissapear to nothing.
content.summary: I saw a faint light in the sky then it turned to a very bright white and flew north to south and in seconds it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my 2 buddies were driving down i-69 this past saturday to ball state university to visit some friends. as we got close to our exit, i think its exit 41, i noticed 2 black objects. i didnt really think much of it, until i noticed how they were moving. the were side by side, except one was a little higher than the other. they were still, then would move positions and kind of go back and forth, very odd movements. at that time i really couldnt believe what i was looking at so i told my friends what was going on, and i rolled down my window to get a better look at these things. we were getting off the exit and there was trees now in front of the objects. as soon as we exited and passed the trees, the objects had either gone away or they were obstructed by the clouds. either way, it was a very strange and thats all i could talk about. my friends however did not get a chance to see the objects. i do engineering work for a software company and i do have access and do work on one of our f-16 bases near here. i see a lot of military aircraft and these 2 objects did not seem like conventional aircraft in the way they moved. thanks for your time

jason
content.summary: 2 disk/flat black object moving in formation

content.detailedDescription:
The house i live in is on the highest elevation in the city of reykjavik 
with a superb view in every direction.  my apartment is on the second floor 
and my balcony faces southwest and from it i can see the whole downtown area 
and beyond, the ocean stretching out to the horizon.  with little pollution 
here, the view is often splendid.  tonight there is almost a clear sky, with 
only a bank of low lying thick cloud on the south west horizon.
i don't smoke in the house, so i go to the balcony for a smoke and every 
time i do, i have a good look around for unusual lights in the sky, or 
whatever and until tonight i had not spotted anything unusual.  at about 
23.30 hours i went again for a smoke and a peek and as i opened the door i 
saw some bright lights in the distance that caught my eye.  there were many 
white lights and one red blinking light in the centre, so naturally i 
assumed it was an airplane.  i then started thinking that was an odd route 
for a big plane to take, there is no international airport in reykjavik, but 
50 km away in keflavik and even if the flightpath is over the city, they 
have reached such an altitude by then, they go unnoticed below.  the next 
thing i notice, is that the lights are over the sea, far from the city and 
moving in what seemed a slow flight, either towards me, or away.  then it 
struck me, that the distance between the lights would mean that this thing 
was huge, so i ran back inside to get my binoculars and rushing back to the 
balcony, was just able to see with my bare eyes how the lights lowered and 
disappeared into, or behind the cloudbank in the southwest.
i spent many years as a sailor and learned to judge distances of weather 
fronts, as neccessity demands.  this cloudbank is at least 50 km away, 
probably more like 75 km and as i stated lowlying.  so standing there with 
my mouth agape in astonishment i quickly calculated that the object had to 
be almost as big as the city.
my sceptical mind tried to come up with other explanations, but the distance 
of the cloud bank cannot be disputed by many km and therefor i write you 
this short report.  yes the red light in the centre blinked pretty much as 
you would expect a commercial airliner to do, but the distance simply does 
not compute to that explanation.  end of report.
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My co-worker and i were outside of work when we both heard a noise and looked up to see an object moving across the sky.  it moved from west to east at approximately 6:20 in the evening of aug 19, 2006.  i thought it sounded like a jet engine so was surprised to see an egg shaped object whose wings alternately appeared then disappeared repeatedly over several minutes.  the object eventually disappeared behind clouds on the eastern horizon.  the sun was setting but did not seem to reflect off of the object which was somewhat darker than the clouds.
content.summary: i saw an egg shaped object slowly move across the sky in north haven, ct.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were renting a house in holt, michigan during the summer of 1961. we had been out and returned home about 10:00 p.M. when we got out of the car, i noticed that there was a full moon and some of the features were especially vivid and distinct. when we went into the house, i decided to get my binoculars to get a better look at the moon. my wife stayed inside. i remember leaning over the hood of our car and resting my elbow to support the binoculars. there was no traffic on our street and the night was quiet. suddenly, i heard a rhythmic, swishing noise coming from my left. my first thought was that the noise was at street level, but quickly rejected that because there was no traffic. at that point, i knew that the noise was coming from above and traveling east to west. i could not see anything and could only hear this swishing sound. when the sound reached my line of sight with the moon, i was amazed to see a huge, oval shaped object that was traveling in a westerly direction. there were no lights; only the swishing noise and a flat-looking, gray oval shaped object. i tried to see the object with my binoculars but do not remember seeing much. since there were very few clouds, i thought that it was unusual that i could not see this object until it was back-lighted by the full moon. when the object passed from under the moon, i could no longer see it but could still hear the swishing sound. i was somewhat familiar the the aircraft of that generation because i had been in the air force r.O.T.C. program at michigan state and had opportunities to see different kinds of airplanes. i know that it was not and airplane, balloon or blimp. although the actual sighting was 5-10 seconds, i could hear the swishing sound for 30-60 seconds. i am a salary retiree from general motors and have a b.A. from michigan state university. (go spartans)
content.summary: Large, oval shaped & 2-dimensional looking. grey hue. swishing noise.

content.detailedDescription: I was 12 years old and playing in a sand box with my older brother. it was warm, sunny, beautiful summer day. my mom was getting lunch ready for the family. we were relaxing between the farm chores of the day.  i was playing, deep in thought when i felt a sort of warm breeze blow across my back which was turned away from the mountain. it was a erie feeling that made the hairs on my back raise. it wasn't a sound but a sort of vibration feeling. something i had never felt before. i stopped playing  and looked up and over my right shoulder and saw what looked like 3 dark-grey saucers hoovering about the mountain. i was mesmerized. i couln't take my eyes away. i started to holler to get someone's attention. the brother i was playing with just had ear surgery with a large gauze bandage covering his ear and couldn't hear what i was trying to say.  another older brother heard my screams. he was sitting in a kitchen chair backwards in the open front door enjoying the breeze.  once he realized something was up he moved in his chair to see what i wanted. i have always been a quiet, content child who didn't  make a lot of fuss so this was a strange thing for me to be hollering. i remember i was still starring at the three objects and heard my brother slide his chair around to get a better look.  it only took a split second but as soon as my brohter tried to get a look the objects they quickly mooved in a 90 angle pattern and withen a split second was gone from sight. if i had looked toward my brother or blinked my eyes, i would have missed the movement,they were that fast. my brother later said he did see  some dark objects but they were a blurr when he finially focused on them.  i was not a child to make up stories and my family knew i had seen something stange. i still wonder to that day if other people in the area saw the same thing. other nearby towns would be duxbury,hanksville, bolton...Etc...  i may be off the exact date in july of 1972 but i know i was 12 years old and witnessed something i couldn't explain and would always wonder about. i have always thought about being hipnotized but never did it.         sincerely,  a witness of a strange sighting many years ago  ps.  looking back, i felt like i was being watched. i was a child and it felt like i was being watched because of my youth and  innocence. as soon as my brother who was an adult tried to see them; they quickly sped away.      strange!! uh?
content.summary: There were 3-grey saucer-like disks hoovering about camels hump approx. 1000 ft. above the tip

content.detailedDescription: On august 17, 2006 at just after 9:00 p.M. i had pulled into a gas station off hwy 41 near st john/cedar lake indiana. glancing up i noticed seven large disk in a military type formation approaching from the northeast. they seemed to be moving fairly slow.Truly taking time to figure what it was i was witnessing i concentrated on them believing at first it was just a large type aircraft, like a stealth with running lights on. there were 7 "lights" in total.Four across then one slightly behind on the left and two slightly behind on the right together looking like a flying wedge. as they approached though the two disk on the right pulled closer to the four flying across and dipped slightly down, while the single light on the left pulled closer to the four and dipped up and above the front four. now losing its original formation it confirmed that this wasn't one aircraft with seven running lights. the now seven disk moved closer. they seemed maybe four to five hundred yards up. they weren't moving very fast. almost to seem like blimp speed, but then they turned heading almost straight north over lake michigan. once heading north they took off at a great speed and elevated at a remarkable pace. they where a clear almost flat white color, no beaming light. they were large like a standard size door. they made no sound. when they turned around they were nearly straight above me. had they made sound i would have heard it. i waited a hour then contacted both the st john and cedar lake police departments just to see if anyone else reported anything. as of that time i was the only caller. for what its worth i am a six year veteren of the usaf as a law officer. stationed at both sac and tac bases. i have seen my share of aircraft. civilian and military. these were neither.
content.summary: 7 disk size of doors in near military formaton, only to manuver around each other.White in color.300 yds,soundless yet quick.

content.detailedDescription: Aprox. 9;40 pm driving home through north eastern napa bell-air subdivision i saw a strange colored light in the sky to orange to be a star and too low, i pulled over and for about 1 minute viewed a object with my wife and two kids, which appeared about 1000-2000 ft. up not moving to much a little side to side maybe even down but then back up. this object was on fire, it looked like a marshmellow in the camp fire to long molton parts on fire where falling off and down to earth but burning up just before they hit we watched in awe! it started to move away and i tried to follow, it seemed to burn out!! it was not a metor,or shooting star all of us agree. i have never seen anything like this, it was a realy experiance i would just like to know if anyone else saw this object?
content.summary: Fire ball droping 2000 ft up stationary dropping firery smaller objects

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i had a feeling to go outside and look up into the stars.  i went outside onto my deck and was laying on my lounge.  nothing unusual last night, just a few light clouds.  i was watching some of the airplanes coming from the northeast to the southwest heading to dfw airport.  you can clearly make them out to be airplanes.  

while i was looking at the stars directly overhead, one star started moving at a fast speed toward the north east.  i stood up and tried to focus to see if there were any blinking lights and there were none.  it looked just like a distant planet.  i thought for a second that it might be a satelite, or something.  i'm not sure.  it caught me off guard and i watched for a while longer and never saw anything like it again.  

in my lifetime i have seen lots of "falling" stars, but this was not one of them.  

i've seen another ufo many years ago (15-16yrs) while i was driving around lake murray in southern oklahoma.  that night, my friend and i stopped my car and got out to watch it.  it was a red sphere that looked like it had a thin cloud layer around it.  there were no other clouds in the sky.  i called my parents from my cell to let them know what direction is was going.  they lived about three miles to the northwest of where i was and they actually saw it fly over their house.  there was no sound and then it disappeared.
content.summary: It looked like a distant star that took off and headed north east

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home after having been to a circus in the town of plymouth michigan.  i was crossing a rr track near my home while looking to be sure the tracks were clear i noticed it to my right hovering above the tracks in the distance.  i decided to see what it was so i drove towards it hoping to get a better look at it, while calling my sister to tell her what i was seeing.  i had taken my camera with me to the circus, so i grabbed it and started taking pictures, the sky was very dark and i at first couldn���t get it to show up (although the object itself was illuminated).  

    i stopped in a parking lot where i had a clear view,  there were no sounds coming from it at all.  i continued to take pictures while talking to my sister, i looked at my camera to try and change the settings and when i looked back it was moving away from where i had been watching it.  i got in my truck and started following it.  as i was driving down plymouth rd. i keep wondering why no one else was stopping to see it.  i was very alarmed yet curious and somewhat scared at what i was seeing.  

  as i came around a bend in the road i saw airplanes, approx 4-5 and also a helicopter.  i noticed that it had stopped again and was hovering just above the treetops.  i couldn���t get over the enormous size of it.  it appeared to be at least the size of a house.  all the while i was taking pictures, hoping to get at least one good picture, while talking to my sister who i had put on speakerphone.  then i heard the helicopter and i look to my right to see it, when i looked back to my left where the object had been hovering, it was no longer there.

i was very nervous and excited the entire time.  i gave my sister a play-by-play as the events unfolded.  she kept asking me exactly where i was just in case something were to happen.  the object appeared to be translucent and very very bright.  the entire thing lasted about ten minutes, although it seemed a lot longer.  i watched the local news that night and checked the newspapers and was very shocked to see no mention of it.  i can���t believe that i was the only who saw this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving home one night i noticed a large bright disc in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside after dusk finishing up some clean up with my 15 y/o son. as we are amateur astronomers we had noticed the constellations were very apparent that evening. my son saw an east bound satellite and called my attention to it. while i started moving from under a tree to see, my son sees the satellite make a sharp, right angle movement and when i look it appears to be a north bound satellite. we have seen satellites literally hundreds of times and are extremely familiar with the normal orbits of satellite traffic over our area. this right angle movement appeared to coincide with the apparent intersection of the satellite traffic paths from our vantage point, i.E. north/south and east/west traffic. also of note the "star" appeared to continue it's flight due north until it was no longer visible to the eye and was still visible for some seconds using averted vision. the "star" also did not wink out as a satellite normally does when it reaches the earth's shadow.
content.summary: What appears to be an east bound satellite suddenly makes a right angle turn then appearing like  a south bound satellite.

content.detailedDescription: It was off the coast of the palos verda pennisula. i saw what i thought was a submarine. it came to the surface and i was amazed, i go to the beach a lot and had never seen one before. i keeped watching it but it just didn't seem right. it was not level,the nose was out of the water but toward the back it was under the water. i keeped thinking it would level off and come to the surface all the way but it didn't. i was about a 1/2 mile away so i didn't see it well enough to give a better discription of it. it just set there for 15 min. or so and then went down. it went down way to fast for a sub. i am not sure what it was ... but i don't think it was a sub. if it was a ufo, this one could travel under water.
content.summary: I believe it was a uso

content.detailedDescription:
Our family had returned from a picnic.  everyone went to bed except my 22-year old son and i.  i asked him what he was looking at outside, and he said he wasn't sure.  this drew me outside, so we both sat on the bench and watched this object, about the size of a small plane at a short distance away.  at first i thought it was indeed a small plane which was traveling straight away from us, since i didn't see any movement, but after my eyes adjusted to the darkness, i could see that it was hovering almost like a pendulum, going slowly side to side and occasionally up and down.  it had twinkling/pulsating reddish lights.

i'm familiar with what stars, planets, and satellites look like, but this thing did not appear to be like any of them, nor was it any kind of tower.  i made sure my eyes weren't playing tricks on me (i was completely sober, too). the object made no noise, and it appeared almost like someone was dangling it from the sky, suspended over the land or the nearby lake and twinkling brightly.  that first night, it stayed twinkling for about 15 minutes (we don't know  how long it had been there before my son spied it), and gradually the lights faded out, one by one.  he claims he saw the exact type of object when fishing last summer over another lake (we now live near a different lake, 20 miles to the east of that one).  

last night, on a whim, i went out back and saw the same object again, doing the same thing, twinkling/moving/hovering slowly, and it was still there when i went to bed. i even walked to a different spot among the trees where lights wouldn't impede my viewing, and it was as bright as the brightest twinkling star, only with a reddish cast.  my son said he had seen it the previous night while he was fishing.

so these are several sightings, over the course of a year or so by my son, and just this month for me.  we've only noticed it around 11:00 or so, and my son sees it around 2 am when he's out fishing.  i'd like to know what the heck it is so i can get a decent night's sleep.

it doesn't make sense to take a photo of it, since it only looks like a very bright star; we don't have a video camera.
content.summary: Bright twinkling reddish lights; appear to be 3 of them arranged like a triangle

content.detailedDescription:
On receiving an email request from mufon headquarters i telephoned the named witness, sylvia, at the phone number provided around 8:40 pm mdt. i stated who i was and why i was calling and sylvia began to recount what she and her roommate, rebecca, had observed the night before. i found both women to still be excited over what they had seen and eager to tell me about their shared experience. here is a summary of what i learned from the pair. hereafter the case has been assigned to fi cheryl gantz for a more thorough onsite investigation, to which both witnesses have agreed.

the women were returning home to fort collins after spending some time in estes park, colorado, when sylvia, the passenger in the vehicle, noticed a bright object in the western night sky that she characterized as brighter than a commercial aircraft's lights and changing color from red to blue/green. shortly into her description of the object she began to eliminate a number of natural and man-made possibilities including a bright star and planets as well as a plane/jet/helicopter as likely explanation for what she was viewing. she described the object's motions from two perspectives 1) while riding in an automobile and 2) having stopped and stepped outside the vehicle to observe the object from a fixed position. at various times she and her roommate both indicated that the object had moved in vertical as well as horizontal movements over a roughly 45 minute period. the location from which they attained their best viewing was from horsetooth reservoir, just west of fort collins, colorado. the speed of its motions were described as being variable, sometimes rapid, sometimes more leisurely. both noted that when commercial aircraft flew into the area that the object under observation would descend. of note, sylvia only mentioned that she had observed a smaller "ball-shaped" object in the vicinity of the larger object but provided few details. this may be due to the fact that she was unhindered by driving provided that my memory remains accurate on that point. each witness expressed excitement and feeling overwhelmed at what they had observed the night before and it was still present in their voices over the phone. i found each to be starightforward in their recounting of the previous night's events and at this point have no reason to doubt their sincerity. both witnesses reported that they lost sight of the object as it appeared to fade and drop below a mountain that was their horizon.

during the course of her account sylvia also volunteered that on at least one occasion she was able to observe the reflection of a commercial aircraft in the reservoir as it passed overhead. however, she expressed feeling some confusion as to why, then, she was unable to view the reflection of the unidentified light above as well.

both witnesses claimed other people at the reservoir were observing the object from various points. including themselves, in all they tallied 9 witnesses; 2 people traveling by motorbike, 2 cars containing 2 adults each and 1 child. both sylvia and rebecca noted that the child showed excitement during the event.

sylvia characterized the shape of the object as pyramid-shaped or a-shaped with concise edges. rebecca offered no information about the object's appearance other than the same red/green/blue. 

rebecca reported leaving estes park around 10:30 pm mdt on august 16, 2006, and both generally agreed that the beginning of their observations began around 11:30 pm mdt until roughly 12:15 am mdt on august 17.

ethan rich
fi, ssd
colorado mufon director, investigations
august 17, 2006
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While night driving two women observe and stop to observe a bright object in a clear sky changing color from red to blue and performing variable vertical and horizontal movements over a 45 minute period.

content.detailedDescription:
I just wanted to back up the people in ny who just reported the object they saw, i also saw the exact thing except it was last night and my neighbor was standing outside with me and also saw it but he got scared and went inside.
it was around 9:45pm and i thought it was a satellite moving south but it started to slow down and i told him its slowing down and it came to a complete stop then after a minute it started to twinkle like a star and i thought the same as they did.
how cool is that.
i watched it for another 30 minutes and it stayed in that position but i was tired and came in to bed.
i find it very interesting when someone else saw what i did.

thanks jc
content.summary: I also saw the same star-like object moving south also stop then twinkle like a star

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work when i noticed a black disk shaped object descend from the sky at an abnormally rapid pace.  i watched it as it came low to the ground and dissapeared behind a grouping of trees.  i did not see it ascend back up from my position on the road.

being curious i took a side road that seemed to lead in the direction where i had seen the disk come down.  after some difficulty finding it's location i remember coming into around a corner near a field when i clearly saw it.  it was about the size of a small house and cast no reflection or gleam from any surrounding light.

as soon as i saw the object i experienced time loss.  i awoke about four hours later in my truck.  my battery was dead but i got the time from my watch.

i don't know what happened but my overriding fear is that i was given some sort of implant through the means of an anal probe.  i have read about anal probes and i understand that extraterrestials use them to implant us with electronic devices.  i would like to be checked to see if some sort of foriegn object was placed in my body through an anal probe.
content.summary: Disc shaped object descended from sky. checked it and experience time loss.
My wife and i  watched what we thought was a plane come to a complete stop and take on the appearance of a star

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from the starbucks with my two children ages 7 and 4 and my son asked me what that truck was doing flying in the sky! i looked and there it was flying from south to north about the height of a passenger jet usually flies, and this object had no visible wings it literally looked like a huge brownish beige colored beat up ship of some type, i put my sunglasses on to get a better look and i could see a brown slight trail of smoke coming from the back end. we were amazed because it wasnt all smooth like a blimp it had some good indents and features that looked like an huge old beat up looking truck. i have only seen on other unidentified object over sonora about 4 years ago but it looked nothing like this was a very detailed object. the speed that it was traveling was so slow at first and then it seemed to pick up speed very quickly, but my family watched the entire event and was utterly amazed for 10 minutes. i'm a college grad and my job is considered a high profile one, so i would like to remain anonymous. thank you.
p.S. the object was flying/floating in a continous line across the skyline almost in a jerky motion almost like it was unstable in the air but it glided through the air with no noise whatsoever. i usually dismiss objects that i'm not sure what they are but this one was so differant like it didnt belong in the air at all. we lost sight from the houses in the neighborhood.

thats all thanks
content.summary: The object had no wings and it was huge it looked like a long garbage truck (tall with gadgets protruding all over)with a small amount of brown smoke trailing the object

content.detailedDescription: On a clear night i was sitting outside of my apartment smoking a cigarette, looking up at the stars. an object came into my view, it had 3 circles that made a triangle shape, 2 in the rear and 1 in the front. i say front and rear only because it was moving forward in a direction with the 1 circle in the lead. it made no noise and was almost transparent(light gray or almost white). it was hard to judge the altitude, but if i had to guess using the large pine tree across the street as a reference point i would say it was about 50-200 feet in the air. it did not make any erratic manuvers nor did it have any lights and seemed to not be powered by any engines. there was no smoke or exhaust of any kind that i saw. it just smoothly glided in a straight path across the sky. i only saw it for a few seconds and unfortunetly i was alone. initially i thought it might have been a spiders web floating (i see them all the time but mostly during the day)or some kind of lights, but when it didnt chage shape or size or direction i could clearly see the features of the object. it also seemed to me, because of the object almost beig transparent that it might of been hard to see it on a bright sunny day. my initial feeling was "what in the hell was that", no one is going to belive me, and i am a skeptic so how am i going to convince myself. but i know what i saw and i dont think i am crazy. so take it or leave it this is the only place i found to report a sighting, there isnt any numbers in the phone book to report something like this. i dont know if you will need to contact me but i would be happy to answer any questions you might have, so in turn i can get my questions answered, because i cant come up with any rational explanation to what i saw. thanks
content.summary: I saw an unidentified flying object

content.detailedDescription:
My wife & i sit out in the back yard several nights a week watching the sky. we have never seen a ufo until saturday night august 12th at 10:00 pm.We were waiting on the meteor shower to start, when this thing came into view.It was opaque and disc shaped.Traveling from straight up to a southwestern direction.We have lived by the airport and seen about any type aircraft you can name.I am an x military man and served during the nam era.We have never reported a ufo before to anyone, because we haven't seen one. that is till saturday.A perfect night, no haze, no clouds and the humidity was down.Stars were a plenty.This disc shaped thing was like a bulls eye target. center was pinkish, next ring faded to a yellow, and the outer ring was orange.Guessing the height at about 10,000 ft i would say it was 
traveling very fast;maybe as much as 10,000mph. not as fast as a meteor but a lot faster then a satalite(which is higher) 
it was traveling straight south by southwest and in a hurry. it was not bright at all. just seemed as though the inside lights were shining through the outer skin.Only lasted about 3-4 seconds and went behind my house, out of sight. it clearly was not a spotlight. it was not an airplane. it had no outer lights and left no trail or sound. nothing.I sent this report before, but got no response. after all these years of watching, and i finally saw something. i'm 67 years old and i am not looking for publicity or anything. no one came and took me aboard, and i've never seen an alien. i was wondering if there were any other reports from indy folks about this? the whole thing looked as though it was behind a shower curtain or something. sort of blury yet i could make out what i discribed.If you extend your arm out and look at your thumbnail, it was about that size.A few minutes later we did see some meteorites fly over fast as a zip. this was not traveling that fast.If it was 10,000 feet up we're talking about an object the size of a 747.
please respond and let me know if anyone else saw this thing. thanks ron
content.summary: Traveled across indy sky, straight overhead for approxamately 4 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
My mom and i were traveling down a road thru a canyon called santiago canyon on our way home. i was looking up at the stars and i saw 2 triagular shaped objects that had bright tinted blue lights at the tips. 
they were going in a straight slow direction and then they flew up slowly towards the sky and disappeared. and my mom saw the tip of one of the flying objects too. i was really shocked and scared at the same time.
i told my mom that there was something in the sky. i believe i experience a sighting of a ufo.
content.summary: I saw a  triagular ufo coming home through santiago canyon  with my mom

content.detailedDescription:
This is probably nothing but it was clearly strange.

my husband and i were at an old staging area for the alameda creek trail in fremont that continues on out into the sf bay wetlands. quite deserted at the time.

the weather was pleasantly warm there was only a slight breeze with no gusts. the sky was completely cloudless except for one strangely shaped rectangular cloud that sat apparently unmoving. 

i use a wheelchair when we go on the trail and as my husband was taking it from the car i was watching the cloud and mentioned it's unusual appearance. 

i sat down and the chair drifted backwards and i took my eyes off the cloud formation for a period of perhaps 20 seconds. when i looked up the cloud had completely disappeared not a wisp. i mentioned it to my husband who is very much a skeptic and he commented that was strange also.

my feeling was that cloud was obscuring something else. having seen some of the reports of rectangular clouds the move at unnatural speed it prompted me to report this. it was in an area where there are often multuple criss-crossing classic case "chem-trails"

i'm sure there could be a number of explanations for the rapid dispersion of the formation but it left me with the feeling that it was some other than a natural occurance.
content.summary: Not a vehicle but a strange cloud formation

content.detailedDescription:
In 1990, on the way back to my home in california, coming from new mexico, i stopped off at the tropicana casino in las vegas and played black jack into the night.I went to the restroom around 4 am and on my way back to the tables i stopped and watched a peculair individual walking up the stairs. this person had a hat and sunglasses on, yet something wasn't right with the way he was walking or climbing the stairs. it looked like he was stuck in mud,his knees sorta came out to the side as he tried raising his feet to take the next step. i noticed also that there were about 3 more that looked just like him at the top of the stairs,yet some taller. they all were skinny,tall,and i recall noticing thier whitish like hair that seemed to shimmer as if light was bouncing off it ,i had never seen hair like this before . my reaction at the time was what a freak ,i repeated to myself. the one on the stairs stopped ,turned, looking at me, the others at the top were looking down at him and me. i felt guilty for staring at a freak ,decided to get back to my table. at the table i immediately tell the dealer ,who was friendly, that man did i see some freaks. he asked what they looked like and i described them. he calmly said ,oh you saw them, there from spain.

it wasn't until i heard charles hall interviewed in '05 ,that i made the connection of this event. as a matter of fact ,i had thought my mind was playing tricks on me (i do have a good memory) so i lately had to delve back into my memory to recall all detials of this event. i was able to recall all details prior ,durring and after this (occured on a new moon in may '90) . so, after emailing charles and finding out that one might be able to contact the talls by camping on blm land around indian springs, i went out and bought a 4wheel drive and headed to indian springs. i found what i felt was a good place to camp and on only 2 occasion did i see tall activity. late one night thier scout craft approached me ,i signaled my light at it and called out hello tall whites ,please land ,i want to be your friend etc , the ship stopped and then went into reverse and hid in these low level clouds (in the direction of french pk). another night ,i saw 2 leviating talls towards the back area of cactus springs ,which is next to indian springs,on blm land.It was early in the evening around 930-10. the one landed and changed the brightness of its light ---to real bright, the other had it on low ,yet it decended down from the ridge top. they hung out there for about 15 minutes. i signaled and stayed put. the one danced around back there, it seemed to be enjoying itself,i felt. anyhow, the lights turned off,i couldnt see them, i started to hike thier way but it was too far to hike plus nothing going on anymore ,so i turned around. i had to learn the dirt road better anyhow ,since thier was a gulley that made it hard to hike all the way. there turned out to be a longer road to get there, i later camped there,but no more sightings occured. i gave up and became very frustrated trying to contact them,i might try another day. i definately believe that the talls are real and that they are around indian springs, but they must be alot more private then they were in the 60's. for one the afb has grown in size and population and thier are mp's 24-7 covering alot of ground. my guess is that the talls might be exiting out the back ,between warm springs and rachel??? or threw the town of mercury. 

i've shared this information in person with charles ,by phone with linda howe and dr boylan ,m salla. i am not selling anything ,nor do i want to become noticed. i just wanted to communicate with what i feel are the good aliens
content.summary: Explained below

content.detailedDescription:
about a month ago my wife returned home after walking the dogs,claiming
to have seen some ufo's. so i went out with her,sure that all it was were
some car lights or planes. what i saw i could'nt explain at all. 
  the next night we went back, this time i had my 15x70 binoculars. at a
ridgeline about one mile south of red rock canyon,(approx nine miles from
my location.)several lights were moving about the mountains. a bright one
would rise up then split into a number of dimmer lights,in daisey chain
formations. the wind was blowing good and the 15x70s were hard to keep trained on this strange event.
  being an amateur astronomer/tinkerer i rigged a tripod mount for my
bino's,and a couple of nights ago, we went back. this time the show was
downright erie. clearly i could make out sauceresque forms, several bright
ships!? were moving behind the ridge casting a glowing pall, that back
lit the foreground ridge. ocasionally one would rise up and over the crest
and fragment into many, up to fifteen smaller components,always slightly
angled always a dead straight line. this occurs due north of us, adding to this scene some would aproach the main body, from the west, or east, or
appear out of nowhere glowing brightly then split into a new daisey chain
  a good number seemed to scan and comb the desert floor a good deal closer to us. appearing out of the dark darting and weaveing then going 
dark again. the play of lights between these and the main body seemed to me like semiphore. at certain points those in the hills dashed a span of
three or four degrees in one or two seconds, i don't know how fast that is
but at a distance of nine miles, seems a good clip.
  we watched this for a good two hours with no sign of a let up. the crazy
part is i bet they will be there again tonight, and again tomarrow.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Between 5 and 20 lights zig-zaging, fragmenting and coalescing, darting, and hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 5:30 in the morning while i was out hunting moose on the mullinstream road.  i stopped at a spot that i knew had lots of moose and was sitting there before the sun came up. it was an overcast day with high clouds. there was a slight northwesterly breeze as there was a tall tree (still with leaves) just behind where i was parked.  just about the time when i could actually see within the treeline i noticed an object rise above the treeline at about a few kilometers (estimated). my first thought that it was a helicopter.  i observed the object as it ascended into the air and i could distictly make out that it was moving away from me at about a thirty degree angle.  it proceeded on it's trajectory for about a minute, or so it seemed, and then it stopped and turned towards me.  at this point it was about a forty five degree angle from the horizon. i watched this thing approach and remember telling myself that it had no sound.  it was close enough that if it were the helicopter that i thought that it was that i would have heard it by now.  as it got yet closer to my postion i got the idea to put my rifle scope on it so as to get a better look at it.  it passed directly overhead and i made no sound what-so-ever. i watched the object pass over me through my scope and could clearly see that is was triangular in shape and that it had five lights on it.  the point of the object had a blue light and the four remaining lights were orange with no markings on the rear end of it.  i can also remember thinking that i should take a shot at it but decided against such action...Out of fear of what might happen....Lol.  i watched the object go pass me until i could not see it any longer with the naked eye, which was about a twenty minute duration.  by the way it seemed to me that it was dark grey in color (almost like charcoal) and the thing made absolutely no sound what-so-ever.  this is an honest account of what i saw that morning and i didn't tell anyone for quite some time...For fear of ridicule.  this is my story of what i witnessed on my hunting trip.

james denny jr.
content.summary: The object was charcoal grey in color and had four orange lights and one blue light...No sound!!!

content.detailedDescription: K..I was driveing south bound on rt 1 in south kingstown i noticed a very bright object my friend was in the passenger seat and saw it too.. we both determined it was a light in the middle of noth bound and south bound that was lit up 150 feet or so off the ground we thought it to be for constrution but it was 150feet above the woods that are between south bound and north bound so we thought it was strange so as we aproached my exit i decided to go passed my exit 200feet to see it because it was 200 feet passed my exit..So i went into the brake down lane and stoped the car to look at it and my friend and me both stared at it ..At this time is when i noticed i never seen one car on south bound or north bound for tem minutes not one car while we were looking at it so..Me and my friend we to the turn around to go back on the north bound as we are going around the turn around at 1 mile an hour im looking up at it  im amost underneath it and me and my friend both seen 6 lights just like the new led flash light they have today the ones the are tiny leds but really bright well thats what this was 6 leds it was a saucer the size of 3 medium cars that had 6 lights looked like 5feet from each other going around the top part of this saucer..From far away they aperaed to be 1 light very bright but because we were so close looking up at it thats how we know it was 6 indviduel lights so now we went around the turn around and went north boud for like 1min turned the car around to go south bound still looking at it took my exit still looking at it my house is 500feet from the high way still looking at it drove on my lawn ran in the house got my camra and my friend took his eyes off of it for a sec and it was gone when he looked back ..I got in my car went on to south bound and it was still wasnt anywhere to be seen and me and my friend both noticed trafic was very very hevy on south bound and north bound when the whole time we were looking at it before for 10mins never seen a car on south bound or north........
content.summary: Unbleaveable,not only did i see it but my friend was in the car with me and saw it too...It was a round object with 6 lights very very bright it was the size of 3 med cars,.

content.detailedDescription: I was doing my morning run at about 5 am eastern time and looked up and i seen a bright orange light flying out the sky i only seen it for about 4 seconds it was really fast. i had no idea what it was but i knew it was not a plane or any other man made devices.
content.summary: It was a orange bright color in the sky flying very fast i seen it for about 4 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were heading home one night and we saw a big, giant thing in the sky. it looked like a big orange disc. we saw it for just a split second, before it disappeared. it looked like one giant fireball to as it disappeared.
content.summary: Huge, giant fireball disc.
